author: kenney
msg: o Resolved MNG-692, although I think a more general solution is required;
o Fixed another boolean-logic error in the ear plugin.
Stephane: (x != a) || (x != b) is always true, unless a == b.. ;-)

author: vsiveton
msg: Refactored the ScmReport class to handle the SCMs with the maven-scm component. Generates reports for all SCMs supported by the maven-scm-provider component: ClearCase, CVS, Perforce, Starteam and SVN.

author: sylvain
msg: More Cocoon stacktrace goodies: the flowscript engine is now part of the game!
